sentences.sentence: The flowers belonged by right to the florists.
sentences.translation: 鲜花当然由献花女捧着。

sentences.sentence: Even hairdressers and florists are required to have one.
sentences.translation: 甚至理发师和花店老板都需要。

sentences.sentence: The flowers will be available at selected florists from the beginning of November.
sentences.translation: 从今年十一月初开始，人们将能够在指定花商处购买到这种玫瑰。
